channel.title: television on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in television on Joost Plattel

item.title: Taping interviews
item.description: Last week I've spend some time before camera lenses. On wednesday I got a call for an interview for RTL Nieuws about CES and wearables. A quick interview got me 2 minutes of fame (on from 18:10) on television. On thursday, a longer interview for Arte TV, that will be shown later this month (viewable online too).

item.title: On the TV for VPRO Labyrint
item.description:
On sunday evening, the VPRO aired a new episode of Labyrint, a show for popular science. This episode included coverage of the Quantified Self and an interview with me (in dutch)! I've included the video for you to watch below:
I'm very happy with the end result! As tracking becomes moreÂ ubiquitous more people will start to use it.
